casebody.data:
U.S. BANK NATIONAL ASSOCIATION, as Trustee FOR STRUCTURED ASSET INVESTMENT LOAN TRUST, MORTGAGE PASS-THROUGH CERTIFICATES, SERIES 2006-1, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Justin Ryan Kapono FERGERSTROM; Akiko Watari Fergerstrom, Defendants-Appellants,
and
U.S. Bank National Association, as Trustee for Structured Asset Investment Loan Trust, Mortgage Pass-Through Certificates, Series 2006-1; Association of Apartment Owners of Honouliuli Gardens, Defendants-Appellees,
and
John Does 1-50; Jane Does 1-50; DOE Partnerships 1-50; DOE Corporations 1-50; DOE Entities 1-50, and DOE Governmental Units 1-50, Defendants NO. CAAP-17-0000364 Intermediate Court of Appeals of Hawai'i. May 8, 2018

SUMMARY DISPOSITION ORDER

Vacated. Remanded.
